noContentYet.thereAreNoContentTypeForExe:
**Functional Purpose**: Message indicating no content is available for a specific type and exercise.
**UI Location**: Dig Deeper section → Specific content type (e.g., Community Videos, Introduction)
**When Users See This**: When there are no entries for the given content type for the current exercise.
**Technical Context**: Variables `contentType` and `exerciseTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "There are no {contentType} for {exerciseTitle}."
noIntroductionYet.digDeeper:
**Functional Purpose**: Section heading for the 'Dig Deeper' content.
**UI Location**: Dig Deeper section (main heading)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the 'Dig Deeper' section for an exercise.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Dig deeper"
noIntroductionYet.thereAreNoIntroduction:
**Functional Purpose**: Message indicating no introduction notes are available for an exercise.
**UI Location**: Dig Deeper section → Introduction subsection
**When Users See This**: When the Introduction section has no notes for the current exercise.
**Technical Context**: Variable `exerciseTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "There are no Introduction notes for {exercise.title}."
noIntroductionYet.wantToContribute:
**Functional Purpose**: Prompt encouraging users to contribute.
**UI Location**: Dig Deeper section → Introduction subsection (below no content message)
**When Users See This**: When the Introduction section is empty, suggesting a contribution opportunity.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Want to contribute?"
noIntroductionYet.youCanDoItHere:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text for contributing introduction notes.
**UI Location**: Dig Deeper section → Introduction subsection (contribution link)
**When Users See This**: When the Introduction section is empty and a contribution is suggested.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; part of an `<a>` tag.
**Current English**: "You can do it here."
communityVideos.communityVideos:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the Community Videos section.
**UI Location**: Dig Deeper section → Community Videos subsection (section header)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the Community Videos section.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Community Videos"
communityVideos.walkthroughsFromPeople:
**Functional Purpose**: Description for the Community Videos section.
**UI Location**: Dig Deeper section → Community Videos subsection (section header description)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the Community Videos section, providing context for the content.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Walkthroughs from people using Exercism"
communityVideos.wantYourVideoFeatured:
**Functional Purpose**: Prompt asking if a user wants their video featured.
**UI Location**: Dig Deeper section → Community Videos subsection (no content message)
**When Users See This**: When there are no community videos available for the current exercise, encouraging submissions.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Want your video featured here?"
communityVideos.submitItHere:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text for submitting a community video.
**UI Location**: Dig Deeper section → Community Videos subsection (submission link within no content message)
**When Users See This**: When no community videos are present, as a call to action to submit one.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; part of a button with an underline styling.
**Current English**: "Submit it here."
